articles.title: "He Played 200 Beats A Minute": Robot Drummer Stuns Engineers By Mastering Complex Songs With Uncanny Human-Like Precision - Rude Baguette
articles.description: IN A NUTSHELL 🥁 Researchers have developed a humanoid robot that can play complex drum patterns with high precision. ☕ The idea for the Robot Drummer emerged from a casual coffee chat among researchers. 🎵 The robot achieved over 90% precision in genres rang…

articles.description: Apple's rumored new more affordable MacBook could have a starting price as low as $599 and launch as soon as this year, according to a new...

articles.title: WinRAR Zero-Day Under Active Exploitation – Update to Latest Version Immediately - The Hacker News
articles.description: WinRAR 7.13 fixes CVE-2025-8088 zero-day exploited in attacks on Russian firms, linked to Paper Werewolf.

articles.title: Mario Nintendo Switch Games Hit All-Time Low Prices At Walmart - GameSpot
articles.description: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door, Mario & Luigi: Brothership, Super Mario Odyssey, and more are on sale for $39.

articles.title: New Swiftie Marc Maron Covers ‘Bigger Than the Whole Sky’ - Vulture
articles.description: Newly-minted Swiftie Marc Maron posted a cover of Taylor’s ‘Bigger Than the Whole Sky’ on social media. ’ It broke me,’ he wrote. ‘I got choked up in the middle of the last verse.’

articles.title: Modder Is Determined To Breathe New Life Into A Classic WW2 Game - DualShockers
articles.description: The Medal of Honor: Airborne Redux Mod just received a massive 2.0 update with over 120 changes.
